src_original: madyenākṣiptamanasaḥ puruṣāḥ paśubhiḥ samāḥ /
tgt_original: 酒能亂人心　　令人如羊等

src_original: kāryākārya na vindanti tasmānmadyaṃ vivarjayet // Dhs_10.9 //
tgt_original: 不知作不作　　如是應捨酒

src_original: madyakṣipto hi puruṣo jīvannapi mṛto mataḥ /
tgt_original: 若酒醉之人　　如死人無異

src_original: ya icchejjīvitaṃ saukhyaṃ sa madyaṃ varjayet sadā // Dhs_10.10 //
tgt_original: 若欲常不死　　彼人應捨酒

src_original: madyaṃ sarvadoṣāspadam  sarvadoṣāspadaṃ madyaṃ sarvānarthakaraṃ sadā /  sarvapāpeṣu sopānaṃ tamasāmālayo mahān // Dhs_10.11 //
tgt_original: 酒是諸過處　　每常不饒益 一切惡道階　　黑暗所在處

src_original: madyena pretaloke narake vā patanam  madyena narakaṃ yānti pretalokaṃ tathaiva ca /
tgt_original: 飲酒到地獄　　亦到餓鬼處

src_original: tiryakṣu yānti puruṣā madyadoṣeṇa vañcitāḥ // Dhs_10.12 //  viṣādapi viṣaṃ madyaṃ narakānnarakaṃ tathā /  vyādhīnāṃ ca paraṃ vyādhirmadyamuktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // Dhs_10.13 //  madyena hānipradarśanam  buddhīndriyavināśāya dharmaratnaṃ kṣayāya ca /
tgt_original: 行於畜生業　　是酒過所誑

src_original: dīrghāgamasya yad duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.6 //
tgt_original: 長夜遠行苦　　此苦不可說

src_original: avidyendhanamagnasya dahyamānasya coṣmaṇā /
tgt_original: 沒於屎溺中　　熱氣之所燒

src_original: garbhasthasya hi yad duḥkha na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.7 //
tgt_original: 如是住胎苦　　不可得具說

src_original: āhārarasagṛddhasya nityaṃ tadgatacetasaḥ /
tgt_original: 常貪於食味　　其心常希望

src_original: yad duḥkhaṃ paragṛddhasya na ca varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.8 //
tgt_original: 於味變大苦　　此苦不可說

src_original: yad bhavatyadhikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.9 //
tgt_original: 所受諸苦惱　　此苦不可說

src_original: praṇaṣṭe hṛdi yad duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.10 //
tgt_original: 眾生受斯苦　　此苦不可說 病苦害人命　　病為死王使 眾生受斯苦　　此苦不可說 為他所策使　　常無有自在 眾生受斯苦　　此苦不可說

src_original: tṛṣṇāviṣavidagdhasya nityaṃ paryeṣaṇātmakam /
tgt_original: 愛毒燒眾生　　遣求大受苦

src_original: āmṛtyu yad bhave duḥkhaṃ na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.11 //
tgt_original: 次第乃至死　　此苦不可說

src_original: avyucchinnaṃ bahuvidhaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ pāpamitrajam /
tgt_original: 若近惡知識　　眾苦常不斷

src_original: apāyajanakaṃ yasya na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.12 //
tgt_original: 當受惡道苦　　此苦不可說

src_original: vyasanaṃ putradārāṇāṃ yad dṛṣṭ(vā)
tgt_original: 妻子得衰惱　　見則生大苦

src_original: narakāṇāṃ mahāmārgo na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.13 //
tgt_original: 出過於地獄　　此苦不可說

src_original: kṣutpipāsāvidagdhasya dīpyamānasya vahninā /  yad duḥkhaṃ naṣṭamanaso na tad varṇayituṃ kṣamam // Dhs_19.14 //
tgt_original: 飢渴自燒身　　猶如猛焰火

src_original: cāpalyaṃ sahajaṃ strīṇāṃ bhāskarasya yathā prabhā // Dhs_9.56 //  anityaṃ sauhṛdaṃ tāsāṃ dīptānāmarciṣāṃ kaṇaiḥ /  vairañca śāśvataṃ tāsāmaśmanāṃ ca yathā vraṇaiḥ // Dhs_9.57 //
tgt_original: 婦人非常友　　如燈焰不停 彼則是常怨　　猶如畫石文

src_original: dhanahīne virajyante dhanayuktā bhavanti ca /
tgt_original: 雖親近富者　　無物則厭人

src_original: yāvadartha striyastāvadarthahīne kutaḥ striyaḥ? // Dhs_9.58 //
tgt_original: 有物婦女近　　無物婦女捨

src_original: na sevābhiścadānena nopakāraiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ /
tgt_original: 與物興供養　　作種種功德

src_original: svīkarttuṃ na striyaḥ śakyāḥ jvalanopamacetasaḥ // Dhs_9.59 //
tgt_original: 其心如火焰　　而不可秉執

src_original: yathā naro 'nukūlaśca chandakarttā yathā yathā /
tgt_original: 男如是隨順　　如心之所欲

src_original: tathā tathā striyastasya vañcanākuśalāḥ param // Dhs_9.60 //
tgt_original: 彼如是婦女　　而常誑男子

src_original: puṣpacchatro yathā sarpo bhasmacchatro yathā nalaḥ /
tgt_original: 如蛇華所覆　　如灰土覆火
